examples: I earn just about enough to pay the rent.
Gano lo suficiente para pagar el alquiler.
How much rent do you pay for this place?
The landlord has put the rent up again.
El arrendador ha vuelto a subir el alquiler.
The landlord charged them a month's rent in advance.
El arrendador les cobró un mes de alquiler por adelantado.
